sources.title: Lend Me Your Husband
sources.description: Title: Lend Me Your Husband Summary: Jeff imagines he's in love with his wife's best friend and runs off with her, but is soon disillusioned by her antics, such as smashing his car. Directed by: Frederick Hayward Actors: John Stuart, Nora Swinburne, Nancy Burne Production Company: George King Productions Release Date: 18 November 1935 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Jeff imagines he's in love with his wife's best friend and runs off with her, but is soon disillusioned by her antics, such as smashing his car.

metadata.Plot: Jeff imagines he's in love with his wife's best friend and runs off with her, but is soon disillusioned by her antics, such as smashing his car.
